00049         // this is a helper method which only makes sense as long as
00050         // edges border at most two elements.
00051         const FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>* otherElement(const FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>* element) {
00052             assert(elements_.size()==2);
00053             // Return the 'other' element on the current edge
00054             return (elements_[0]==element) ? elements_[1] : elements_[0];
00055         }
00056
